name: Constraint-heavy scheduling
description: Dense calendar (29 event instances across 5 days) with layered constraints: time-window restriction, buffer requirements, daily caps, and day-spread minimums. Each day has only 1-2 valid placements within the 9am-1pm window once 15-min buffers are enforced, totaling 8 valid positions for 5 required blocks.

task_prompt:
Schedule 5 one-hour focus blocks during Jan 20-24, 2025. Rules:
1. TIME WINDOW: focus blocks must start and end between 9:00am and 1:00pm UTC (morning/early afternoon only)
2. BUFFER: there must be at least 15 minutes of travel time between a focus block and any adjacent event
3. MAX PER DAY: at most 1 focus block per day
4. SPREAD: blocks must be spread across at least 4 of the 5 weekdays
5. DURATION: each block must be exactly 60 minutes
6. NO CONFLICTS: don't overlap with any existing events

My calendar has daily standups at 9am, daily lunch at noon, plus various meetings throughout the week (product review, all hands, customer calls, design reviews, 1:1s, sprint demo, etc.). Working hours are 9am-5pm UTC.

custom_rules.description: 15-min buffer between focus blocks and other events
Blocks on at least 4 different days
